textPlain: > Another surprising feature of the BWT is that for reversing the permutation, no extra information is needed!I think this is not true. The way I learned the BWT, after encoding, you need to store the index of the first character (which is a tiny bit of extra information). https://web.archive.org/web/20170325024404/http://marknelson...
There is a fully bijective version of the BWT which doesn't require the index. It's not what BZip2 uses though.
